panels.description: Map showing the percentage of parking occupancy in Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql:
WITH distinct_sensors AS (
  SELECT 
    sensor_name, 
    latitude, 
    longitude, 
    is_available,
    gather_time
  FROM "sc_database"."parking_mv"
  WHERE (sensor_name, gather_time) IN (
    SELECT sensor_name, MAX(gather_time)
    FROM "sc_database"."parking"
    GROUP BY sensor_name
  )
  AND (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)
),
sensor_data AS (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(sensor_name, '^(.*?)\\s*-\\s*.*', '\\1') AS parking_name,
    latitude,
    longitude,
    is_available
  FROM distinct_sensors
  WHERE REGEXP_REPLACE(sensor_name, '^(.*?)\\s*-\\s*.*', '\\1') IN (${parking_sensor:singlequote})
),
parking_counts AS (
  SELECT 
    parking_name,
    AVG(latitude) AS latitude, 
    AVG(longitude) AS longitude, 
    COUNT(*) AS total_sensors,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_available THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS available_sensors,
    SUM(CASE WHEN NOT is_available THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS occupied_sensors
  FROM sensor_data
  GROUP BY parking_name
)
SELECT 
  parking_name,
  latitude, 
  longitude,
  (occupied_sensors::float / total_sensors::float) * 100 AS occupancy_percentage
FROM parking_counts;

WITH distinct_sensors AS (
  SELECT 
    sensor_name, 
    latitude, 
    longitude,
    gather_time
  FROM "sc_database"."parking_mv"
  WHERE (sensor_name, gather_time) IN (
    SELECT sensor_name, MAX(gather_time)
    FROM "sc_database"."parking"
    GROUP BY sensor_name
  )
),
sensor_data AS (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(sensor_name, '^(.*?)\\s*-\\s*.*', '\\1') AS parking_name,
    latitude,
    longitude,
    CASE WHEN gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS in_time_range
  FROM distinct_sensors
  WHERE REGEXP_REPLACE(sensor_name, '^(.*?)\\s*-\\s*.*', '\\1') IN (${parking_sensor:singlequote})
),
parking_counts AS (
  SELECT 
    parking_name,
    AVG(latitude) AS latitude, 
    AVG(longitude) AS longitude,
    SUM(in_time_range) AS total_in_time_range
  FROM sensor_data
  GROUP BY parking_name
)

SELECT 
  latitude,
  longitude,
  CASE WHEN total_in_time_range > 0 THEN true ELSE false END AS in_time_range,
  CASE WHEN total_in_time_range > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 15 END AS icon_size
FROM parking_counts;

WITH distinct_sensors AS (
  SELECT 
    sensor_name, 
    latitude, 
    longitude, 
    is_available,
    gather_time
  FROM "sc_database"."charging_station_mv"
  WHERE (sensor_name, gather_time) IN (
    SELECT sensor_name, MAX(gather_time)
    FROM "sc_database"."charging_station"
    GROUP BY sensor_name
  )
  AND (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)
),
sensor_data AS (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(sensor_name, '^(.*?)\\s*-\\s*.*', '\\1') AS parking_name,
    latitude,
    longitude,
    is_available
  FROM distinct_sensors
  WHERE REGEXP_REPLACE(sensor_name, '^(.*?)\\s*-\\s*.*', '\\1') IN (${charging_station_sensor:singlequote})
),
parking_counts AS (
  SELECT 
    parking_name,
    AVG(latitude) AS latitude, 
    AVG(longitude) AS longitude, 
    COUNT(*) AS total_sensors,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_available THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS available_sensors,
    SUM(CASE WHEN NOT is_available THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS occupied_sensors
  FROM sensor_data
  GROUP BY parking_name
)
SELECT 
  parking_name,
  latitude, 
  longitude,
  (occupied_sensors::float / total_sensors::float) * 100 AS occupancy_percentage
FROM parking_counts;

panels.title: Charging station occupancy

panels.description: General information on the status of car parks in Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    sensor_name AS "Parking - Spot" , 
    CASE 
        WHEN is_available = TRUE THEN 'Unoccupied'
        WHEN is_available = FALSE THEN 'Occupied'
    END AS "AVAILABILITY",
    CASE 
        WHEN plate = '' THEN 'No information on the license plate' 
        ELSE plate
    END AS "PLATE",
    DATE_FORMAT(gather_time, '%d %b %Y, %H:%i:%s') AS "READING", 
    CONCAT(ROUND(layoff / 60.0, 2), ' min') 
    AS "DURATION"
FROM "sc_database"."parking"
WHERE (sensor_name, gather_time) IN (
    SELECT sensor_name, MAX(gather_time)
    FROM "sc_database"."parking"
    GROUP BY sensor_name
)
AND (REGEXP_REPLACE(sensor_name, '^(.*?)\\s*-\\s*.*', '\\1') IN (${parking_sensor:singlequote}))
AND (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)
ORDER BY sensor_name ASC

panels.title: State of the parking lots

panels.description: General information on the status of charching stations in car parks in Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    sensor_name AS "Charging Station" , 
    CASE 
        WHEN is_available = TRUE THEN 'Unoccupied'
        WHEN is_available = FALSE THEN 'Occupied'
    END AS "AVAILABILITY",
    CASE 
        WHEN plate = '' THEN 'No information on the license plate' 
        ELSE plate
    END AS "PLATE",
    DATE_FORMAT(gather_time, '%d %b %Y, %H:%i:%s') AS "READING", 
    CONCAT(ROUND(layoff / 60.0, 2), ' min') 
    AS "DURATION"
FROM "sc_database"."charging_station"
WHERE (sensor_name, gather_time) IN (
    SELECT sensor_name, MAX(gather_time)
    FROM "sc_database"."charging_station"
    GROUP BY sensor_name
)
AND (REGEXP_REPLACE(sensor_name, '^(.*?)\\s*-\\s*.*', '\\1') IN (${charging_station_sensor:singlequote}))
AND (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)
ORDER BY sensor_name ASC

panels.title: State of the charging stations

panels.description: General payment information about parking lots, not affected by parking selection.

0.text: No data in the specified interval

result.text: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(bill) AS "Average payment" FROM "sc_database"."payment_parking_mv"
WHERE (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)

SELECT MAX(bill) AS "Highest payment" FROM "sc_database"."payment_parking_mv"
WHERE (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)

SELECT MIN(bill) AS "Lowest payment" FROM "sc_database"."payment_parking_mv"
WHERE (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)

panels.title: Charging stations payments received

panels.description: Displays the consumption of charging stations in Padua.

targets.rawSql: SELECT gather_time as time, kWh as " ", sensor_name FROM "sc_database"."charge_consumption" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime AND sensor_name IN (${charge_consumption_sensor:singlequote})) ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Charge Consumption

panels.description: Displays the quantity of waste accumulated in the recicling depot in Padua.

targets.rawSql: SELECT gather_time as "time", readings as " ", sensor_name FROM "sc_database"."waste_filling" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1000
